title: Bug 113047 - No children nodes listed when changing data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab
description: On the data set editor page of the query tab, when changing the data source for a data set, the children nodes are not being listed as expected.
OB: Currently, when changing the data source for a data set in the data set editor page, the children nodes are not being listed.
EB: The expected result is that when changing the data source, the new data source's children should be listed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the data set editor page in the query tab.
2. Select a data set.
3. Change the data source for the selected data set.
4. Check if the children nodes of the new data source are listed.
